system.requirement: If you wield a katana with grace, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} +edge (instead of +iron). If you do...

abilities.description: When you score a strong hit on a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike}, you may cede the initiative. If you do, add +2 to your next move.
When you score a weak hit on a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash}, you may choose to inflict no harm. If you do, you have the initiative.
When you score a strong hit on a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash}, add +1 to your next move.
